answers.answer: Cool, I joined the ADA with Bret Michaels as the sponser this yr..I am all for this day since I have type 1 Diabetes and on the pump. Hope all get out and join for free or talk to your legislative and vote to find a cure and raise awareness!@!!

question: Just a reminder to join us on World Diabetes Day!JDRF is hosting a live UStream broadcast on World Diabetes Day on November 14th at 3pm EDT as part of their new Type 1 Talk program. They are covering the following topics: artificial pancreas/FDA approval process, lessening/preventing autoimmunity attack of beta cells, increasing public awareness & improving education about type 1 diabetes, treatments: existing & "in the works,” and health care coverage for type 1 adults. You can log on and watch the broadcast by going to http://www.ustream.tv/channel/jdrf-advoc.... You can also look for opportunities to watch the event with other people impacted by type 1 in your community. Check out JDRF’s Type 1 Talk Facebook application at http://bit.ly/Type1TalkApp and be sure to hit the “go to application” button. You can use this application to search for an event or to host your own!
title: Put us on your calendar: Nov 14 @ 3pm EDT
